[vc_row][vc_column]

Multi-layer Barrier PET Bottle

[vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″]

→ Brief Introduction

[vc_column_text]Multi-layer barrier Bottle normally is used for the sensitive beverage industry or the pressure bottle. Due to the different layers of the preforms, it helps the content keeping away from gone bad. But it is difficult to be blown by stretching type. Based on the decade’s experience of R&D in two stage stretch blow molding machine,WASHUNhas successful developed a new system for the Multi-layer barrier bottles. It is suitable for the different multi-layer barrier application.[/vc_column_text]
Applications
Sauces, preserves, beer, cheese, cleaner…
Advantages
Optimized material distribution for enhanced package appearance
Cost saving on raw material

→ Remark

[vc_column_text]Multi-Layer barrier bottle is also called as barrier bottle, normally is made from the multi-layer preforms or the single layer bottle with additional inner or outer coating layer.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4372″ img_size=”full”][vc_column_text]

Multi-Layer barrier bottle Samples

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]WASHUN Machinery, the Professional blow molding equipments supplier in China.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

→ Related Blow Molding Machines:

[vc_column_text]– MG-SS Stretch blow molding machine
– MG-E Stretch blow molding machine
– RB Rotary Stretch blow molding machine
– EB Electric Stretch blow molding machine[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
